sentences.sentence: The shops had still a pleasant quaintness.
sentences.translation: 店铺里依然弥漫着一种亲切的古雅气氛。

sentences.sentence: The “Buy America” clause in the $787 billion stimulus package signed into law on Tuesday has a certain quaintness to it.
sentences.translation: 美国7870亿美元刺激计划中的“购买美国货”条款签署成为法律有些奇妙。

sentences.sentence: Time rocked on, however. Roy and I are now accustomed to the 10 quaintness of our table for two and we enjoy our lives together.
sentences.translation: 然而时光荏苒，现在，我和罗伊已经习惯了新奇有趣的“二人餐”，享受两人世界。
